archimate:Requirement.name: AS.1.1.5: A security assurance review of each target environment (sometimes in the form of an independent security review) should be performed on a regular basis (ideally ongoing), by applying a repeatable security assurance process that consists of:
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
